data.title: 54 movies with British accent for learning English + Video!
data.meta_description: This movie list will provide you with opportunities to listen to British accents in different contexts and genres, helping you further enhance your listening skills for the IELTS exam. Enjoy…
data.text:
This movie list will provide you with opportunities to listen to British accents in different contexts and genres, helping you further enhance your listening skills for the IELTS exam. Enjoy watching!

1. The King’s Speech (2010)

One of my favorite movies with amazing acting (Colin Firth), a historical drama centered around King George VI and his speech therapist, featuring a variety of British accents.

2. Harry Potter (film series)

Harry Potter is a film series based on the eponymous novels by J. K. Rowling. The series is produced and distributed by Warner Bros.

In this video, you can see these expressions and examples in more than 3437 episodes of series and movies:

have you heard

according to

well done

make sure

make a promise

brutal

trun up

go on

make a fool of

you can also see 115 Slang and Idioms in Harry Potter movie with meaning and examples in this link.

3. Bridget Jones’s Diary (2001)

A romantic comedy set in London, showcasing various British accents and everyday conversations.

4. Love Actually (2003)

A heartwarming ensemble film set in London during the holiday season, offering exposure to different British accents and speech patterns.

5. Pride and Prejudice (2005)

A classic romantic drama based on Jane Austen’s novel, featuring elegant British accents and formal language.
